phrases: You saw that extraordinary strength, did not you?
He is a piece of work...
Now, let us start the indoor person-to-person combat training with Team A and Team D!
I will not do so much damage that this fight gets stopped, but I am going to get close!
Wow, he is like a martial arts master!
My Deku is not always going to mean useless!
Because Kacchan and I lived in the same neighborhood...
Let us go kill the enemy!
He was the type who could do anything he tried his hand at...
All men are not created equal.
This was the reality I learned about society at the young age of four.
I am really angry right now!
I am not asking about how you feel!
Going off on his own like that...
Cannot tell with just the cameras in a fixed position and no sound.
He is talking to his partner over the small wireless radio.
You can bring that plus the building's floor plan...
Once you wrap this around your opponent, it shows that you have captured them.
and the heroes do not know where the nuclear weapon is located, right?
The heroes are clearly at a disadvantage here!
Heroes should be able to turn the tables on whatever predicament they are in.
Besides, did not Mr. Aizawa tell you, too?
You must be sure of yourself.
I am glad I got to see Eraser Head's moves in person!
If it is Kacchan, he will be impatient
and swing with his right again!
He is not even using his Quirk fighting against the guy who finished first in the entrance exam!
He was always good at reacting quickly in a crisis.
He spent years writing his notes and internalizing them.
He kicked first this time to keep me from predicting his moves.
I cannot get close to him as easily anymore.
You tricked me, did not you?!
Was it fun tricking me all this time?!
You have got a flashy Quirk there, do not you?!
Try and get me with it!
Because I am way above you!
I had heard from young Midoriya that young Bakugo thinks well of himself, but this is too much.
He completely ignored Uraraka and shot at me.
If they were going to send an advance guard, it would have been better to send Iida, who has more mobility,
and I am sure he knows that.
That probably means he is running wild on his own, and the two of them are not working together.
In the first place, our chances of winning are lowest if we have a head-to-head battle with those two.
If Uraraka and I both went to the hideout, that is what would happen.
And even if the two of us stayed here to fight Kacchan,
we are in danger of running out of time.
All that is left is for Uraraka to find the weapon and Iida,
and then I will head over for a 2-on-1 fight.
That is how we can win.
That is assuming I can beat Kacchan, though.
As long as I am careful of his palms, I can do this.
How can you even stand in the same ring as me?
It is not like I am trying to compete with you or anything!
I take back... everything I said!
Izuku, you really cannot do anything, can you?
You can read the characters for Izuku as Deku, you know.
And Deku means someone who cannot do anything!
Kacchan, how many times did yours skip?
Wow, that is an amazing Quirk!
It is a flashy Quirk just right for a hero, right, Katsuki?
I hope I get mine soon, too.
No matter what Quirk you get, you will never beat me.
Deku does not have a Quirk.
Yeah, it is called being Quirkless.
Do not worry about it, Izuku.
You are the least amazing, Deku.
Forward march, members of the Bakugo Hero Agency!
Hurry up and get back up here!
It would have been bad if you hit your head.
Do not look at me with that face!
You looked like you were asking for help...
Now I just have to tell Deku and hide until he gets here.
Baku go is a natural at being bad, but that fits this training perfectly.
Then I must also devote myself to being a villain.
This is another trial to turn me into a man who will not bring shame to the Iida family.
Be dyed with evil in order to become a hero!
He is taking this so seriously!
I knew that you would come here alone the instant Bakugo ran off by himself.
Your Quirk allows you to make the objects you touch float.
That is why before you arrived...
Now you cannot play your little tricks!
He is starting to look... like a villain...!
The middle of the fifth floor.
We probably do not have much time left, either.
If we run out of time, our opponents win!
Why will not you use your Quirk?
Are you saying you can win even if you do not use it?
I have no choice but to do it.
I am not scared of you anymore!
With your stalking, you probably already know...
let us me secrete nitroglycerin-like sweat from the sweat glands on the palm of my hand and make it explode.
If they made this the way I asked,
then these gauntlets will store the nitroglycerin inside them, and...
Do not tell me that is...
Are you trying to kill him?!
If I do not hit him, he will not die!
This is supposed to be a class!
The more that is stored in these gauntlets, the stronger the blast.
Come on, use your Quirk, Deku...
Even if you are at full strength...
What in the world did you do?
If we retrieve the weapon, we will win!
I will not let you, hero!
We need to touch the weapon itself for it to count as being retrieved.
Can she make herself float now, too?
It is a special move that is hard on my body!
Your Quirk is not a threat if you cannot touch anything.
I will hold out until time runs out!
Hey, hey, what is wrong, Deku?
I did not hit you, so you can still move, cannot you?
He had his costume made so that his Quirk would work even for long distances.
He is going to kill him!
I will not do so much damage that this fight gets stopped, but I am going to get close!
If I do not hit him, he will not die!
Strangely enough, part of him is still sane.
I do not know if it is small-minded or what...
Young Bakugo, the next time you use that, I will stop the fight, and your team will lose.
To attack on such a large scale inside
is inviting the destruction of the stronghold you should be protecting.
That is a foolish plan for both heroes and villains!
You will lose a lot of points for it!
Go to the pillar by the windows!
Let us fight it out with our fists!
It is no good, I cannot dodge it!
He does not look like the type to think...
He changed his course in a blast that doubled as a smoke screen
and then did it again immediately.
Getting in a clean hit while fighting against inertia...
He is too talented... too talented...
It is your favorite right swing!
He is not going to give me a chance to think...
I could not do it after all...
I have no choice... but to use it...
He can capture him for this exercise by just wrapping the tape around him!
Those are not the actions of a hero.
I thought Midoriya was pretty amazing, too...
But in terms of combat power...
That is not something a man should do...
Why will not you use your Quirk?
You have been like this ever since we were kids!
Have you been underestimating me like that since then, you bastard?!
You are an amazing person, so that is why...
Do not look at me like that!
These are the first passionate emotions he is shown other than I want to be a hero!
I am sure this is necessary for you... to arrive at the future you are looking at!
There is still no way I can beat you one-on-one...
You call that a home run?!
You are underestimating me, are not you?!
You kids still have a lot of room to grow!
Young Bakugo will get all teary-eyed!
Because I am better than you!
